name: Treasure Rum
text: If you control a face-up "Treasure" card: you can target 1 card on the field; return that target to the top of the Deck. If this card is sent to the GY by a card effect: you can destroy 1 card on the field; then Special Summon 1 "Treasure" monster from your Deck, but its effects are negated. You can only use each effect of "Treasure Rum" once per turn.
